Legal_Issue: Fairness in visa application process and eligibility proof
Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient evidence of full-time enrollment and attendance provided by applicant
Burden_of_Proof: On the applicant to prove eligibility

Legal_Rule: Applicants must provide all necessary information; visa officers not required to engage in dialogue unless credibility is in question
Procedural_Issue: Lack of additional documentation submitted after officer's concern
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: No unfairness found in the process
Key_Evidence_Considered: Evidence of Jasmin's full-time student status
Legal_Framework: Canadian immigration law, procedural fairness principles
Applicant_Challenge: Challenge to visa denial based on fairness
